name: DinoBall
description:
Tiny arcade game about dinos playing volleyball.

There are three difficulty levels, each of them offers you 10 opponents, each opponent is stronger then previous. Each dino has 3 lives and 3 points of energy. When dino spends all energy he becomes weak.

The Castle | Easy The Caverns | Normal The Temple | Hard Dinos

Choose one of 4 dinos to play:

     

Trigger-Items

Each level contains a set of trigger-items. When ball touches one of them the corresponding effect appears.

The CastleThe CavernsThe Temple - Shield   
 - Spikes   
 - Grow   
 - Slow ball   
 - Double ball
 - Wall spikes   
 - Invisible ball   
 - Traps   
 - Lights off   
 - Cursed ball - Middle stone   
 - No gravity ball   
 - Grow   
 - Stonefall   
 - Power Controls Credits
